name: Management Science Associates - Data Engineering and Test Automation
description: Enhanced data-driven decision-making platforms through ETL automation, critical jobs optimization processing massive datasets (20 billion records, 2TB), and comprehensive test automation implementation for retail analytics leader.
challenge: Critical weekly jobs taking 10+ hours to execute with risk of late delivery and client reputation damage. Massive source data volume with data skewness issues. Need for ETL automation across multiple client implementations and comprehensive test coverage for continuous deployment.
solution: Bifurcated critical jobs into data preparation and computation phases, reducing execution time to 2 hours. Developed semi-automated ETL solution with schema-aware script generation. Implemented comprehensive API-based test automation with 100% test coverage and integration with CI/CD pipeline.
outcomes: 80% reduction in execution time (from 10+ hours to 2 hours)
100% job success and on-time completion rate in last 1 year
0% data spillage compared to previous terabyte-scale issues
Reduced job failure recovery time from hours to 30-90 minutes
100% test coverage with eliminated manual intervention
teamSize: Data engineering and quality engineering specialists
